name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CurlerRoo - REST API client with cURL

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: REST API client which allows managing and sending cURL requests. This extension grants app.curlerroo.com unlimited storage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension grants unlimited storage to CurlerRoo, a REST API client with cURL, at (app.curlerroo.com). Without it, the app can only hold as much as 5MB of data.

Repository for the Web App: https://github.com/CurlerRoo/CurlerRoo
